What can ZakiCode build for you today? 

 (e. g Build a mobile app for habit tracking with custom reminders, goals, streak visuals, reflections, and AI suggestion, Sync progress and join social challenges.)
Write Your Idea Desc:
Describe your app or website idea in simple words — no code needed.
Zaki Code instantly turns it into a ready-to-edit visual project.
Customize It Visually Desc:
Tweak layouts, colors, buttons, and features with an intuitive visual editor.
Everything is editable — no tech background required.
Launch Or Export Code Desc:
Go live with one click or export clean, production-ready code.
Your idea becomes a real, working product in seconds.
Prompt Desc: Ask ZakiCode In Your Natural Language Or Give Requirements. Or Import Figma URL/ File To Convert.
Develop Desc: ZakiCode Will Generate Stunning And Well Researched Website/App Or Convert Your Design Into Code.
Iterate Desc: Customize Your App- Iterate In Your Natural Language Or Make Changes To Code Via Console.
Deploy Desc: Download Your Code, Deploy On Web, Or Push To GitHub As You Wish And Take It Forward.
